title: Mini Crush: Horror Movie Spectacular Part 1
itunes:title: Mini Crush: Horror Movie Spectacular Part 1
description:
Join us this week for our 1st ever Horror Movie Spectacular as Noel and Chuck to talk all things scary movies. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
